files.content:
---
title: Single Line
---

<ComponentPreview name="single-line-demo" />

<PackageInfo>

## Features

- Limits editor to one block of text
- Suitable for brief content or titles

</PackageInfo>

## Usage

```tsx
import { SingleLinePlugin } from '@udecode/plate/react';

const plugins = [
  // ...otherPlugins
  SingleLinePlugin,
];
```

## Plugins

### `SingleLinePlugin`

Plugin that restricts editor content to a single block of text.
